channel.title: Python on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Python on SoftLayer API

item.title: Python
item.description:
toc_collapse=0;Table of contents  Python Making API Calls Using Object Masks Using Result Limits Error Handling Managers More Resources Python SoftLayer, an IBM company, provides a Python-based API package that takes the heavy lifting out of making manual XML-RPC API calls. Our Python-based API requires a minimum of Python 2.6 To install the Python package into your Python installationâ€™s site-packages directory, run the following command:
pip install softlayer
